Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: AdBlocker now merges updates with your custom lists, no more exports needed. Right-click to block instantly. TurboDown 2.0 is faster and smoother. Tabs now move top or bottom. Extension folder fixed. Smarter, faster, and cleaner... your browser perfected!
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size and Windows 7 and Beyond...

English.Char_Desc_45: An extremely fast and secure web browser...
English.Char_Desc_80: An extremely fast and secure web browser to surf the internet with...
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite NetSurfer is a cutting-edge browser designed to offer lightning-fast speed, top-tier security, and unparalleled innovation. It empowers you to explore the digital world freely, without BigTech watching!
English.Char_Desc_450: SSuite NetSurfer is a cutting-edge browser offering lightning-fast speed, top-tier security, and unmatched innovation. With a lightweight architecture, it ensures smooth performance, even on less powerful devices. There are No performance dips, No sluggishness, just pure uninterrupted browsing bliss. Featuring a built-in Ad-blocker, it provides a safe, streamlined browsing experience, free from BigTech control and typical Chromium limitations!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Introducing SSuite NetSurfer, a pioneering web browser meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled security, performance, and innovation. Built on the Chromium framework, SSuite NetSurfer combines the robust foundation of Chromium with its own original design, setting it apart from mere clones found elsewhere on the web.
SSuite NetSurfer browser ensures a seamless and efficient browsing experience, leveraging Chromium's speed and compatibility while introducing unique features tailored for enhanced usability. From streamlined navigation to advanced tab management, every aspect is optimized for both casual browsing and intensive web activities such as streaming sports or watching your most favourite tv-show.
Security is paramount with SSuite NetSurfer, integrating robust measures to protect user data and privacy. Built-in defenses against malware, phishing attempts, and other online threats ensure a secure environment for browsing sensitive information and conducting transactions online. It also comes with a fully updateable built-in Adblocker that will block the most persistent offenders on all websites.
SSuite NetSurfer is based on Microsoft's WIN32 API. Quote from Microsoft's website: "...The Win32 API platform is the choice for applications that need the highest compatibility and direct access to system hardware..."
Unlike many browsers that mimic existing designs, SSuite NetSurfer stands out with its originality and commitment to innovation. Its user-friendly interface and customizable settings cater to diverse user preferences, making it suitable for both individuals and businesses seeking a reliable online browsing solution.
Discover SSuite NetSurfer browser -- where Chromium's power meets original design excellence, delivering a secure, efficient, and personalized browsing experience tailored to modern internet demands.
No Java or DotNet required. Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time...
